name: Camtasia Template
summary: A CAMTEMPLATE file is a project template created by TechSmith Camtasia, a screen recording and video editing application. It stores media files, video edits, and timeline properties that make up the template. CAMTEMPLATE files are similar to .TSCPROJ and .CMPROJ project files, but Camtasia users create them to save videos with content, themes, etc., that they want to replicate.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
